welcome_message_body: Welcome to Caucaia, Brazil! Get ready to be charmed by our beautiful beaches, vibrant culture, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer.

restaurants.address: R. José Rocha, 524 A (R. Getúlio Vargas), Caucaia, CE
